banner.title: create. animate. play.
banner.subtitle: VoxEdit is the first software that allows you to create your own voxel models, rig them, and animate them in no time.

creation.title: ANIMATE YOUR CREATIONS
creation.text: A game changer in the voxel creation world. With our Skeleton System, VoxEdit allows you to rig and animate anything that you want using the timeline via an easy-to-use keyframing mode.
creation.subtitle: Features

items.name: Animation! Bring your creation to life

items.text: Move, Rotate or Scale the bones for animation
Turn on/off the boxes of the model
Work in Global or Local mode
View your work in Voxels or without Edges
Turn on/off the Skeleton bones
Turn on/off emissivity

skelecton.title: Skeleton system
skelecton.text: VoxEdit allows you to rig your model using a hierarchy system that lets you attach 3D model parts to skeleton bones ready to be animated in the Timeline.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.text:
VoxEdit is the first voxel software that allows you to not only rig your model with the Skeleton System but also create animations.

Create all the animations that you want to make a better experience for your model inside the game.

Animate all your models with our Timeline using keyframing interpolation in a friendly interface.

Move keyframes, stretch the interpolation between them, or even add curves for a more polished animation: the choice is yours.

library.title: Library
library.text:
Import all types of files into the Library to assign them to a bone in the Skeleton system.

You can import .obj, .vox and .vxm.

tools.title: POWERFUL & EASY TO USE MODELING TOOLS
tools.text: Make the most of your creativity! From beginners to experts, anyone can make amazing creations thanks to our robust set of tools and our user-friendly interface.
tools.subtitle: Features

items2.text: Fill the box with voxels to start crafting

items.text: Toggle within the Modeling and the Skeleton screen
Mirror your work through all the axes
Rotate your model in all 3 axes
Visualize a Voxel, Quad, or Render view of the model
Increase or decrease the amount of voxels for more or less details
Crop your model so you don’t waste unused space
Set up the Canvas. It can be small or super big
Reset the camera
Choose easily any color for your work
Save your own palette or import an existing one

itemsIcon.text: Save the color in your library
Turn on/off emissivity in your color

iexport.title: Import / Export
iexport.text: Vox Editor supports several standards of 3D file format, including:

items.text: .obj
.vox
fbx
.vxm and vxr (VoxEdit format)

download.subtitle2: Download our Alpha for FREE now and start creating!
